text: <!everyone> There’s an optional meeting tomorrow after school in the shop! Everyone who was part of the team last spring is encouraged to come, I want to get y’all started learning what you need for the season. We’re also going to be prepping for the introductory meeting on Wednesday, so I need experienced people to come as well. It’ll run until 4:30, let me know if you need a ride. If you can’t come on Wednesday, absolutely come tomorrow!
